name: Verlängerter
description: A long black coffee made by adding hot water to espresso.

name: Wiener Melange
description: A Viennese specialty coffee similar to a cappuccino, topped with whipped cream and cocoa powder.

name: Kleiner Brauner
description: A small black coffee served with a small amount of milk or cream.

name: Großer Brauner
description: A large black coffee served with a small amount of milk or cream.

name: Kapuziner
description: A coffee with a small amount of milk or cream and topped with whipped cream.

name: Franziskaner
description: A coffee similar to a Kapuziner, but with a larger amount of milk or cream.

name: Eiskaffee
description: A cold coffee drink typically served over ice cream and topped with whipped cream.

name: Mokka
description: A strong coffee made from darkly roasted beans.
